abstract: Disney decided to go for sneak previews – which is rarely does – for its upcoming romantic comedy “The Proposal.”
snippet: Disney decided to go for sneak previews – which is rarely does – for its upcoming romantic comedy “The Proposal.”
lead_paragraph: More and more, big movie studios avoid “sneaking” their broad-appeal pictures. The practice – opening a movie on a limited basis to ignite buzz in advance of its broad release – can backfire by drawing poor word of mouth. Even if people like the movie, sneak previews can take money off the opening-weekend table and deprive marketers of pushing the “America’s No. 1 Comedy!” button.

headline.main: Disney Goes the Rare Sneak-Preview Route With a Romantic Comedy, “The Proposal”
